import { SecurityService } from "./../services/security.service"; import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-navbar", templateUrl: "./navbar.component.html", styleUrls: ["./navbar.component.scss"], }) export class NavbarComponent { constructor(public secService: SecurityService) {} handleLogout() { alert("logout"); } }
